name: 葉奕良
objective:
Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、等效於連續函數的數位濾波器設計、使用轉換技術設計數位控制系統、使用狀態空間設計數位控制系統、電腦控制。
Z-Transform, Sampled-Data Systems, Discrete Equivalents to Continuous Transfer Functions: The Digital Filter, Design of Digital Control Systems Using Transform Techniques, Design of Digital Control Systems Using State-Space Methods, Application and Practice of Digital Control, Case Study.
schedule:
Week 1. Preparation week
Week 2. Introduction
Week 3. System discretization
Week 4. Z-transform
Week 5. Discrete-time transfer function
Week 6. Stability, frequency response analysis
Week 7-8. A/D and D/A converters, sampling theorem, aliasing
Week 9. Midterm Examination
Week 10-11.  Controller discretization
Week 12-13.  Transfer function control design
Week 14-15.  Controllability and state-space control design
Week 16-17.  Observability and observer design
Week 18. Final Examination
materials:
自編課程講義

參考書目：

[1] K. Ogata, "Discrete-time control systems", Prentice-Hall, Inc., 1995.
[2]  K. J. Åström and B. Wittenmark, "Computer-controlled systems: theory and design", Courier Corporation, 2013.
[3]  G. F. Franklin, J. D. Powell, and M. L. Workman, "Digital control of dynamic systems", MA: Addison-wesley, 1998.
